Name: Star Steel
About the game: 'Star Steel' is a vertical scrolling shooter with a top view. Alien forces appeared in space, and began to take over planet after planet. Your goal is to beat off the attack of all the enemies on the way and destroy the bosses. It is necessary to think carefully, timely and accurately. You have full military readiness, and you have all the necessary ammunition. Your mission is difficult but extremely important, so try not to fail it. Go ahead, Commander! Game Features: Classic gameplay Nice pixel graphics Harmonic soundtrack Steam achievemts support Difficult bosses
